item.description:
http://www.windhamrailtrail.org/

 

Below is the map with directions.  We'll meet in the Windham Depot Parking lot at 11:30.  I drive a silver Acura Integra.  I'll have a sign "Travel Group" in my hands or on my car and will be standing around my car. I did something to my knee so may only be able walk a mile or two.   The trail is 4 miles and is not a loop so you should walk about half as far as you can to be sure you can walk back. 

Looking forward to seeing you all on Saturday! 

http://www.windhamrailtrail.org/map.htm
item.how_to_find_us: I have a silver acura integra and will have a sign "travel group"

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Walk the Windom Rail Trail, Windom, NH
